scripts.build: yarn build:swc & yarn buildCjs & yarn buildEsm
scripts.buildCjsForOldestNode: find src -type f -not -name '*.d.ts' | xargs npx esbuild --bundle --format=cjs --outbase=src --outdir=dist/cjs --platform=node --target=node6.4.0
scripts.buildCjs: find src -type f -not -name '*.d.ts'| xargs npx esbuild --bundle --format=cjs --outbase=src --outdir=dist/cjs --platform=neutral --target=es2015
scripts.buildEsm: find src -type f -not -name '*.d.ts'| xargs npx esbuild --bundle --format=esm --outbase=src --outdir=dist/esm --out-extension:.js=.mjs --platform=neutral --target=es2015
scripts.build:swc: yarn run build:swc:src & yarn run build:swc:test
scripts.build:swc:src: find src -name '*.ts' -not -name '*.d.ts' | xargs npx swc --config-file ./.swcrc.json -d build/swc/src --source-root src
scripts.build:swc:test: find test -name '*.ts' -not -name '*.d.ts' | xargs npx swc --config-file ./.swcrc.json -d build/swc/test --source-root test
